recipeInstructions.text: Sift flour and salt together in a bowl.
In a separate bowl, cream peanut butter, butter, and vanilla together; gradually add brown sugar, beating until well blended.
Add edges one at a time; beat well after each addition. Blend in flour. Stir in peanuts.

Spoon batter into greased, 8-inch square baking pan; spread evenly. Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until center is firm. Cool in pan for 5 minutes, then cut into squares. Remove from pan and cool on wire rack.
